updateSettingsDescription: Update your API connection or change your setup.
welcomeDescription: Agents with the UX they deserve. Connect anything. Organize your sessions. Everything you need to do the work of your life!
setUpAgentDescription: Select how you'd like to power your AI agents.
addMoreConnections: You can add more connections later.
justStartChat: Just start a chat and get to work.
claudeDescription: Use Claude Agent SDK as the main agent.
claudeConfig: Configure with your Claude subscription or API key.
codexDescription: Use Codex CLI as the main agent.
codexConfig: Configure with your ChatGPT subscription or OpenAI API key.
copilotDescription: Use Copilot Agent as the main agent.
copilotConfig: Configure with your GitHub Copilot subscription.
claudeProDescription: Use your Claude subscription for unlimited access.
anthropicApiDescription: Pay-as-you-go via Anthropic, OpenRouter, or compatible APIs.
codexChatGptDescription: Use your ChatGPT Plus or Pro subscription with Codex.
codexOpenAIDescription: Pay-as-you-go via the OpenAI Platform API.
connectChatGPTDescription: Use your ChatGPT Plus or Pro subscription to power Codex.
clickButtonToSignIn: Click the button above to sign in with your OpenAI account. A browser window will open for authentication.
connectedChatGPTReady: Connected! Your ChatGPT subscription is ready.
connectGitHubCopilotDescription: Use your GitHub Copilot subscription to power AI agents.
enterCodeOnGitHub: Enter this code on GitHub to authorize:
browserOpenedGitHub: A browser window should have opened to github.com/login/device
clickButtonToSignInGitHub: Click the button above to sign in with your GitHub account.
connectedCopilotReady: Connected! Your GitHub Copilot subscription is ready.
copyCodeFromBrowser: Copy the code from the browser page and paste it below.
connectClaudeDescription: Use your Claude subscription to power multi-agent workflows.
enterApiKeyDescription: Enter your API key. Optionally configure a custom endpoint for OpenRouter, Ollama, or compatible APIs.
installGitDescription: The easiest way to get Git Bash. It's free and includes everything you need.
alreadyHaveGitDescription: If Git is installed in a non-standard location, you can specify the path to bash.exe.
gitBashRequiredDescription: iWeather needs Git Bash to run shell commands on Windows. It was not found on your system.
sessionExpiredDescription: Your Craft session has expired or is no longer valid.
pleaseLogInAgain: Please log in again to continue using iWeather.
conversationsPreserved: Your conversations and settings are preserved.
